verses.roman:
śrī-kṛṣṇa-caitanya navadvīpe avatari
āṭa-calliśa vatsara prakaṭa vihari

synonyms: śrī-kṛṣṇa-caitanya—Lord Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; navadvīpe—at Navadvīpa; avatari—adventing Himseif; āṭa-calliśa—forty-eight; vatsara—years; prakaṭa—visible; vihari—enjoying.
translation: Lord Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu, adventing Himself in Navadvīpa, was visible for forty-eight years, enjoying His pastimes.
